meanings.definition: A person who aggressively seeks to catch or retrieve balls, especially in sports.
meanings.sent1: The ballhawks at the baseball game caught every foul ball that came their way.
meanings.sent2: The group of ballhawks waited eagerly by the fence, ready to catch any stray balls.
meanings.sent3: The ballhawks were so dedicated that they even brought their own gloves to the game.
meanings.sent4: In the world of baseball, the ballhawks are like skilled hunters tracking their prey.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ballhawks diving for the ball will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: The act of aggressively seeking to catch or retrieve balls, especially in sports.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the ballhawks' enthusiasm for catching balls was unmatched.
meanings.sent2: The ballhawks' persistence paid off as they retrieved the ball before it rolled away.
meanings.sent3: The ballhawks' strategy of teamwork and communication helped them catch the ball effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: The ballhawks' determination to catch every ball was truly inspiring to watch.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ballhawks cheering after a successful catch echoed through the stadium.
